proposal: Who knew a journey from a cozy lap to the digital realm could be so inspiring? Simba's tale isn't just heartwarming; it's now a pioneering symbol in the crypto space. With 197 holders in the ETH network already taking the leap, why not make this community even more vibrant? Imagine deploying your own DEX or engaging in a community-driven lottery, all while honoring Simba's legacy. Let's make every transaction a tribute to the journey from beloved pet to digital currency icon. 🐾🪙
